EmailTemplate.name: MPW-ChangeRequestGenericTemplate
EmailTemplate.subject: {!MPW_Change_Request__c.LastModifiedBy} has submitted {!MPW_Change_Request__c.Request_Type__c} request for Prime Die {!MPW_Change_Request__c.MPW_Prime_Die_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!MPW_Change_Request__c.LastModifiedBy} has submitted {!MPW_Change_Request__c.Request_Type__c} request for Prime Die {!MPW_Change_Request__c.MPW_Prime_Die_Name__c} (Form # :{!MPW_Change_Request__c.MPW_Form_Name__c} , MPW Train: {!MPW_Change_Request__c.MPW_Train_Name__c}).
You will receive an email shortly for approving the record. Thanks.
